Package controller

Class EditEventCommand

java.lang.Object
controller.EditEventCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
Command
public class EditEventCommand extends Object implements Command
Edits existing events based on a specified property change.

  • Constructor Details

    • EditEventCommand

      public EditEventCommand(CalendarModel calendar, String meeting, LocalDateTime target, String subject, String teamMeeting, EditEventCommand.EditMode editMode)
      Constructs an EditEventCommand for single event mode.
      Parameters:
      calendar - the calendar model
      meeting - the subject of the event to edit
      target - the target start time of the event
      subject - the property name to change
      teamMeeting - the new value for the property
      editMode - the edit mode to apply

    • EditEventCommand

      public EditEventCommand(CalendarModel calendar, String originalSubject, LocalDateTime start, String property, String newValue, EditEventCommand.EditMode mode, boolean autoDecline)
      Constructs an EditEventCommand with full parameters.
      Parameters:
      calendar - the calendar model
      originalSubject - the subject of the event to edit
      start - the start time used for matching the event
      property - the property to update (e.g., "subject", "description")
      newValue - the new value for the property
      mode - the edit mode (SINGLE, FROM, or ALL)
      autoDecline - flag to automatically decline conflicting updates

    • EditEventCommand

      public EditEventCommand(CalendarModel calendar, String originalSubject, String property, String newValue, EditEventCommand.EditMode mode)
      Constructs an EditEventCommand with default autoDecline set to false.
      Parameters:
      calendar - the calendar model
      originalSubject - the subject of the event to edit
      property - the property to update
      newValue - the new value for the property
      mode - the edit mode to apply

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public String execute() throws InvalidDateException
      Executes the edit command by updating the specified property for matching events.
      Specified by:
      execute in interface Command
      Returns:
      a message indicating the result of the edit operation
      Throws:
      InvalidDateException - if a date parsing error occurs during the update
